price: 18. Ya soló, amonaki bikamuiseli minene ya Nkolo naye.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
